pullRequest.title: [BEAM-9812] Fixing bug causing pipelines requiring temp tables to not work
pullRequest.bodyText:
The issue occurs here: https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/sdks/python/apache_beam/io/gcp/bigquery_file_loads.py#L333-L346
In line 343, the tableId for the job destination is replaced. Because parse_table_reference does not create a new object, the original object is overwritten, and thus copy jobs are issued from temp_table to temp_table instead of being issued from temp_table to final_table.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

nodes.bodyText: Probably update the spec above to mention that a new object will be returned ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -182,7 +182,10 @@ def parse_table_reference(table, dataset=None, project=None):
   """
 
   if isinstance(table, bigquery.TableReference):
-    return table
+    return bigquery.TableReference(
